oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Confederate Wiley Bartlette
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sgt. Bartlette was from Claiborne Co. and served in Co. H, 61st TN Mtd. Inf. He is writing home to his wife Sallie expressing his hope to see her soon on furlough and cautioning her not to feed too much of the corn to livestock but to save enough for the; family's bread.
